text: @Tobias_Ellwood Here I am today sweating the heat out at in the direct sunlight and these Dick heads who think they know better travel to the beaches possibly carrying Covid-19 with them. If we get another outbreak  and its proved that they travelled to the beach in this heat. Don't treat them.
